item.title: Mit 6.824系列(二): Lab1 MapReduce
item.description: 本文介绍6.824的第一个实验 —— MapReduce的实现过程。 实验要求 Your job is to implement a distributed MapReduce, consisting of two programs, the coordinator and the worker. There will be just one coordinator process, and one or more worker processes executing in parallel. In a real system the workers would run on a bunch of different machines, but for this lab you’ll run them all on a single machine. The workers will talk to the coordinator via RPC. Each worker process will ask the coordinator for a task, read the task’s input from one or more files, execute the task, and write the task’s output to one or more files.
